name: CarOut!
description: CarOut!, a video game which we control a car into a defined scenario and with mechanics as collisions with other vehicles and the use of traps, special attacks or items, we will have to expel the rest of the opponents from the scene. So that we are the last to be in the ring. The game is arcade style, looking for direct and fast fun, especially focused on local multiplayer with up to 4 players.
